posts.title: Introduction
posts.text: I received the M. Eng. degree and B. Eng. degree in Computer Science from South China University of Technology in 2019 and 2016 respectively. I continue my research life as a phD. candidate. my research interests include computer vision, image processing, sparse codingn and deep learning. PublicationsJournal PapersFull-reference image quality metric for blurry images and compressed images using hybrid dictionary learningZihan Zhou, Jing Li, Yong Xu, Yuhui Quan*Neural Comput. & Applic. (2020)[pdf] [arXiv] [MATLAB code] Conference Papers
